00019 #ifndef _KERNELTIMEDATE_C
00020 #define _KERNELTIMEDATE_C
00021 
00022 #include "kernel_time_date.h"
00023 #include "../../ipl98/kernel_c/kernel_string.h"
00024 #include "../../ipl98/kernel_c/kernel_error.h"
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include <time.h>
00028 #include <string.h>
00029 
00030 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00031 using ipl::TString;
00032 using ipl::k_InitString;
00033 using ipl::k_ShowMessage;
00034 using ipl::k_EmptyString;
00035 using ipl::k_AddCharToString;
00036 using ipl::k_AddCharArrayToString;
00037 using ipl::IPL_ERROR;
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 int k_GetTime(char** Time)
00041 {
00042         struct tm tp;
00043         time_t t;
00044         time(&t);
00045         tp = *localtime(&t);
00046 
00047         if (mktime(&tp)==-1)
00048         {
00049                 TString str;
00050                 k_InitString(&str);
00051                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00052                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_GetTime() Failed reading the time");
00053             k_EmptyString(&str);
00054                 return -1;
00055         }
00056         if (*Time!=NULL)
00057         {
00058                 free(*Time);
00059         }
00060         *Time = (char*)malloc(9);
00061         strftime(*Time,9,"%H:%M:%S",&tp);
00062         return 1;
00063 }
00064 
00065 int k_GetDate(char** Date)
00066 {
00067         struct tm tp;
00068         time_t t;
00069         time(&t);
00070         tp = *localtime(&t);
00071 
00072         if (*Date!=NULL)
00073         {
00074                 free(*Date);
00075         }
00076         *Date = (char*)malloc(12);
00077         if (mktime(&tp)==-1)
00078         {
00079                 TString str;
00080                 k_InitString(&str);
00081                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00082                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_GetDate() Failed reading the time");
00083             k_EmptyString(&str);
00084                 return -1;
00085         }
00086         strftime(*Date,12,"%a %b %d",&tp);
00087         return 1;
00088 }
00089 
00090 int k_GetDateTimeYear(char** DTY)
00091 {
00092         char* pStr;
00093         struct tm* tp;
00094         time_t t;
00095         time(&t);
00096         tp = localtime(&t);
00097 
00098         if (*DTY!=NULL)
00099         {
00100                 free(*DTY);
00101         }
00102         *DTY = (char*)malloc(30);
00103         if (mktime(tp)==-1)
00104         {
00105                 TString str;
00106                 k_InitString(&str);
00107                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00108                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_GetDateTimeYear() Failed reading the time");
00109             k_EmptyString(&str);
00110                 return -1;
00111         }
00112         pStr=asctime(tp);
00113         strcpy(*DTY,pStr);
00114         return 1;
00115 }
00116 
00117 clock_t k_StartTimer()
00118 {
00119         return clock();
00120 }
00121 
00122 double k_GetTimer(clock_t StartValue)
00123 {
00124         return (double)(clock()-StartValue)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void k_SecondsToHMS(unsigned long Seconds, char** Time)
00128 {
00129         ldiv_t hours = ldiv(Seconds,3600);
00130         ldiv_t minutes = ldiv(hours.rem,60);
00131         int seconds = minutes.rem;
00132         if (*Time!=NULL)
00133         {
00134                 free(*Time);
00135         }       
00136         *Time = (char*)malloc(12);
00137         if (minutes.quot<10)
00138         {
00139                 if (seconds<10)
00140                 {
00141                         sprintf(*Time,"%d:0%d:0%d",hours.quot,minutes.quot,seconds);
00142                 }
00143                 else
00144                 {
00145                         sprintf(*Time,"%d:0%d:%d",hours.quot,minutes.quot,seconds);
00146                 }
00147         }
00148         else
00149         {
00150                 sprintf(*Time,"%d:%d:%d",hours.quot,minutes.quot,seconds);
00151         }
00152 }
00153
